remarks: The Lebesgue outer measure function respects scaling of sets by positive reals.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Apr-2015.)
statement:
ovolsca.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
ovolsca.2 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ovolsca.3 $e |- ( ph -> B = { x e. RR | ( C x. x ) e. A } ) $.
ovolsca.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` A ) e. RR ) $.
ovolsca $p |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` B ) = ( ( vol* ` A ) / C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
